metadata.name: Self Portrait 1
metadata.description:
Original photograph taken during a video EEG in April of 2007 after my first generalized tonic-clonic (grand mal) seizure.

Altered using VQGAN+CLIP in December of 2021. 

3840 x 2560 JPG

FND Genesis piece.

---

The EpilepsiaAI Project:

Last night I had a seizure, and my computer made some art in response. 

Using text-to-image and video computer learning, I am creating a series about my battle with epilepsy and seizures. Based on phrases, photographs, and mixing aesthetic styles, I form a space and mood for the computer to generate an image or video from.

http://www.failoften.net
